content.html: Things in tech that like to stab you in the back: e2e tests - oh no a random 3rd party API is down and now no one can merge anything monorepos - spend hours configuring CI/CD write-only secrets - never know if your env vars are right using *cool new tech* - HAHA have fun hiring
content.value:
Things in tech that like to stab you in the back:

e2e tests - oh no a random 3rd party API is down and now no one can merge anything
monorepos - spend hours configuring CI/CD
write-only secrets - never know if your env vars are right
using *cool new tech* - HAHA have fun hiring
